displayName.japanese: 野生の服従

description.english: Defeat Jera, the unmerciful Nature jotun.
description.german: Besiege Jera, die unbarmherzige Waldjotun.
description.french: Battez Jera, l'impitoyable jotun de la Forêt.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Jera, la spietata Jotun della foresta.
description.spanish: Derrota a Jera, la despiadada jotun del bosque.
description.schinese: 击败无情的自然巨人，杰拉。
description.russian: Победить Йеру, жестокого йотуна леса.
description.japanese: 無慈悲な自然のヨトゥン、イェラを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Jeran, bezlitosną Jötunnkę lasu.
description.brazilian: Derrote Jera, a jotun inclemente da natureza

displayName.japanese: 闇の打倒

description.english: Defeat Fé, the magnificent Cave jotun.
description.german: Besiege Fé, die glorreiche Höhlenjotun.
description.french: Battez Fé, la merveilleuse jotun des Grottes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Fé, la magnifica Jotun della caverna.
description.spanish: Derrota a Fé, la gloriosa jotun de la cueva.
description.schinese: 击败雄伟的洞穴巨人，费。
description.russian: Победить Фе, величественного пещерного йотуна.
description.japanese: 雄壮な洞窟のヨトゥン、フェを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Fehu, wspaniałą Jötunnkę jaskiń.
description.brazilian: Derrote Fé, a jotun magnífica da caverna.

displayName.japanese: 寒気の制圧

description.english: Defeat Isa, the mighty Winter jotun.
description.german: Besiege Isa, den mächtigen Winterjotun.
description.french: Battez Isa, le puissant jotun de l'Hiver.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Isa, il potente Jotun dell'inverno.
description.spanish: Derrota a Isa, el poderoso jotun del invierno.
description.schinese: 击败强大的寒冬巨人，以撒。
description.russian: Победить Ису, могучего зимнего йотуна.
description.japanese: 壮大な冬のヨトゥン、イサを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Isaza, potężnego Jötunna zimy.
description.brazilian: Derrote Isa, o poderoso jotun do inverno.

displayName.japanese: 嵐の克服

description.english: Defeat Hagalaz, the mesmerizing Storm jotun.
description.german: Besiege Hagalaz, die faszinierende Sturmjotun.
description.french: Battez Hagalaz, la jotun captivante de la Tempête.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Hagalaz, l'ipnotica Jotun della tempesta.
description.spanish: Derrota a Hagalaz, la hipnótica jotun de la tormenta.
description.schinese: 击败迷惑的风暴巨人，哈卡拉兹。
description.russian: Победить Хагалаз, ошеломляющего грозового йотуна.
description.japanese: 魅惑の嵐のヨトゥン、ハガラズを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Haglaz, hipnotyzującą Jötunnkę burzy.
description.brazilian: Derrote Hagalaz, a fascinante jotun da tempestade.

displayName.japanese: 煉獄への挑戦

description.english: Defeat Kaunan, the terrifying Fire jotun.
description.german: Besiege Kaunan, den furchteinflößenden Feuerjotun.
description.french: Battez Kaunan, le terrifiant jotun du Feu.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Kaunan, il terrificante Jotun del fuoco.
description.spanish: Derrota a Kaunan, el terrorífico jotun del fuego.
description.schinese: 击败恐怖的火焰巨人，考纳。
description.russian: Победить Каунана, ужасающего огненного йотуна.
description.japanese: 恐怖の炎のヨトゥン、カウナンを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Kaunana, przerażającego Jötunna ognia.
description.brazilian: Derrote Kaunan, o terrível jotun do fogo.

displayName.japanese: ヴァルハラへの入り口

description.english: Defeat Odin, the Allfather.
description.german: Besiege Odin, den Allvater.
description.french: Battez Odin, le Père de tous.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Odino, il Padre del Tutto.
description.spanish: Derrota a Odín, el Padre de todos.
description.schinese: 击败众神之父，奥丁。
description.russian: Победить Одина, Всеотца.
description.japanese: 万物の父、オーディンを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Odyna, Wszechojca.
description.brazilian: Derrote Odin, o pai de todos.

displayName.japanese: イズンに選ばれしもの

description.english: Find all of Ithunn's Apples.
description.german: Finde alle Äpfel Ithunns.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les pommes d'Ithunn.
description.italian: Trova tutte le mele di Idhunn.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las manzanas de Idunn.
description.schinese: 发现所有的伊森的苹果。
description.russian: Найти все яблоки Идунн.
description.japanese: イズンのリンゴをすべて見つける。
description.polish: Odnajdź wszystkie jabłka Idunn.
description.brazilian: Encontre todas as maçãs de Ithunn.

displayName.italian: Fai una buona impressione sugli Dei
displayName.japanese: 神々の讃嘆

description.english: Find all of the God Shrines.
description.german: Finde alle Gottesschreine.
description.french: Trouvez tous les sanctuaires des dieux.
description.italian: Trova tutti i santuari degli dei.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los santuarios de los dioses.
description.schinese: 发现所有的神殿。
description.russian: Найти все святилища богов.
description.japanese: 神々のほこらをすべて見つける。
description.polish: Odnajdź wszystkie ołtarze bogów.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os santuários divinos.

displayName.japanese: パーフェクト イェラ

description.english: Defeat Jera without taking any damage.
description.german: Besiege Jera, ohne Schaden zu erleiden.
description.french: Battez Jera sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Jera senza subire danni.
description.spanish: Derrota a Jera sin sufrir ningún daño.
description.schinese: 在不受任何损伤的情况下击败杰拉。
description.russian: Победить Йеру, не получив повреждений.
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずにイェラを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Jeran, nie odnosząc obrażeń.
description.brazilian: Derrote Jera sem sofrer nenhum dano.

displayName.japanese: ベジタリアン

description.english: Defeat Jera without killing a single vine.
description.german: Besiege Jera, ohne eine einzige Weinrebe zu zerstören.
description.french: Battez Jera sans tuer une seule plante grimpante.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Jera senza uccidere un solo ramo.
description.spanish: Derrota a Jera sin matar a ninguna vid.
description.schinese: 在不击杀任何藤蔓的情况下击败杰拉。
description.russian: Победить Йеру, не уничтожив ни одной лозы.
description.japanese: つるを1体も倒さずにイェラを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Jeran, nie zabijając żadnego pnącza.
description.brazilian: Derrote Jera sem matar nenhuma trepadeira.

displayName.japanese: フリスビー

description.english: Defeat Fé without attacking her in melee.
description.german: Besiege Fé, ohne Nahkampfangriffe einzusetzen.
description.french: Battez Fé sans attaque de mêlée.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Fé senza attacchi corpo a corpo.
description.spanish: Derrota a Fé sin usar ataques cuerpo a cuerpo.
description.schinese: 在不使用近战攻击的情况下击败费。
description.russian: Победить Фе без использования атак ближнего боя.
description.japanese: 近接攻撃を行わずにフェを倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj Fehu, nie używając ataków wręcz.
description.brazilian: Derrote Fé sem usar ataques corpo a corpo.

displayName.japanese: スナイパー

description.english: Defeat Isa using only the icebergs.
description.german: Besiege Isa nur mit Hilfe der Eisberge.
description.french: Battez Isa à l'aide d'icebergs uniquement.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Isa usando solo gli iceberg.
description.spanish: Derrota a Isa usando solo icebergs.
description.schinese: 在仅使用冰山的情况下击败以撒。
description.russian: Победить Ису только с помощью айсбергов.
description.japanese: 氷山だけを使ってイサを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Isaza, używając wyłącznie gór lodowych.
description.brazilian: Derrote Isa usando somente os icebergues.

displayName.japanese: K.O.無し

description.english: Defeat Hagalaz without knocking her down.
description.german: Besiege Hagalaz, ohne sie zu Boden zu bringen.
description.french: Battez Hagalaz sans la renverser.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Hagalaz senza abbatterla.
description.spanish: Derrota a Hagalaz sin aturdirla.
description.schinese: 在不击倒哈卡拉兹的情况下击败她。
description.russian: Победить Хагалаз, не сбив ее с ног.
description.japanese: ノックアウトさせずにハガラズを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Haglaz, nie powalając jej.
description.brazilian: Derrote Hagalaz sem a derrubar.

displayName.japanese: 危険な仕事

description.english: Defeat Kaunan while at less than 10% health.
description.german: Besiege Kaunan, während du weniger als 10 % Gesundheit hast.
description.french: Battez Kaunan avec moins de 10 % de vie.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Kaunan mentre la tua salute è inferiore al 10%.
description.spanish: Derrota a Kaunan con menos del 10 % de salud.
description.schinese: 在生命值低于10%的情况下击败考纳。
description.russian: Победить Каунана, имея меньше 10% здоровья.
description.japanese: 残存する体力が10%以下の状態でカウナンを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj Kaunana, mając poniżej 10% zdrowia.
description.brazilian: Derrote Kaunan com 10% de vida.
